scripts.build: jade views -o www; browserify -v -t babelify -t browserify-plain-jade lib/index.js -o www/js/index.js; stylus -u nib -u griddy styles/index.styl -o www/css/styles.css
scripts.watch: jade views -o www -w | watchify -v -t babelify -t browserify-plain-jade lib/index.js -o www/js/index.js | stylus -u nib -u griddy styles/index.styl -w -o www/css/styles.css
